And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the seventh<S>1442</S> seal<S>4973</S>, there was<S>1096</S> silence<S>4602</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> about the space of<S>5613</S> half an hour<S>2256</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> which<S>3739</S> stood<S>2476</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>; and<S>2532</S> to them<S>846</S> were given<S>1325</S> seven<S>2033</S> trumpets<S>4536</S>.
And<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> angel<S>32</S> came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> stood<S>2476</S> at<S>1909</S> the altar<S>2379</S>, having<S>2192</S> a golden<S>5552</S> censer<S>3031</S>; and<S>2532</S> there was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> much<S>4183</S> incense<S>2368</S>, that<S>2443</S> he should offer<S>1325</S> it with the prayers<S>4335</S> of all<S>3956</S> saints<S>40</S> upon<S>1909</S> the golden<S>5552</S> altar<S>2379</S> which<S>3588</S> was before<S>1799</S> the throne<S>2362</S>. <sup>offer: or, add it to the prayers</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the smoke<S>2586</S> of the incense<S>2368</S>, which came with the prayers<S>4335</S> of the saints<S>40</S>, ascended up<S>305</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S> out of<S>1537</S> the angel's<S>32</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> took<S>2983</S> the censer<S>3031</S>, and<S>2532</S> filled<S>1072</S> it<S>846</S> with<S>1537</S> fire<S>4442</S> of the altar<S>2379</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> it into<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> there were<S>1096</S> voices<S>5456</S>, and<S>2532</S> thunderings<S>1027</S>, and<S>2532</S> lightnings<S>796</S>, and<S>2532</S> an earthquake<S>4578</S>. <sup>into: or, upon</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> had<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> trumpets<S>4536</S> prepared<S>2090</S> themselves<S>1438</S> to<S>2443</S> sound<S>4537</S>.
<S>2532</S> The first<S>4413</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> there followed<S>1096</S> hail<S>5464</S> and<S>2532</S> fire<S>4442</S> mingled<S>3396</S> with blood<S>129</S>, and<S>2532</S> they were cast<S>906</S> upon<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of trees<S>1186</S> was burnt up<S>2618</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> green<S>5515</S> grass<S>5528</S> was burnt up<S>2618</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the second<S>1208</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> as it were<S>5613</S> a great<S>3173</S> mountain<S>3735</S> burning<S>2545</S> with fire<S>4442</S> was cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the sea<S>2281</S>: and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the sea<S>2281</S> became<S>1096</S> blood<S>129</S>;
And<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the creatures<S>2938</S> which<S>3588</S> were in<S>1722</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, and had<S>2192</S> life<S>5590</S>, died<S>599</S>; and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the ships<S>4143</S> were destroyed<S>1311</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the third<S>5154</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> there fell<S>4098</S> a great<S>3173</S> star<S>792</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, burning<S>2545</S> as it were<S>5613</S> a lamp<S>2985</S>, and<S>2532</S> it fell<S>4098</S> upon<S>1909</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the rivers<S>4215</S>, and<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> the fountains<S>4077</S> of waters<S>5204</S>;
And<S>2532</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the star<S>792</S> is called<S>3004</S> Wormwood<S>894</S>: and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the waters<S>5204</S> became<S>1096</S> <S>1519</S> wormwood<S>894</S>; and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> men<S>444</S> died<S>599</S> of<S>1537</S> the waters<S>5204</S>, because<S>3754</S> they were made bitter<S>4087</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the fourth<S>5067</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the sun<S>2246</S> was smitten<S>4141</S>, and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the moon<S>4582</S>, and<S>2532</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the stars<S>792</S>; so as<S>2443</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of them<S>846</S> was darkened<S>4654</S>, and<S>2532</S> the day<S>2250</S> shone<S>5316</S> not<S>3361</S> for a third part<S>5154</S> of it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> the night<S>3571</S> likewise<S>3668</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S> an<S>1520</S> angel<S>32</S> flying<S>4072</S> through<S>1722</S> the midst of heaven<S>3321</S>, saying<S>3004</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, Woe<S>3759</S>, woe<S>3759</S>, woe<S>3759</S>, to the inhabiters<S>2730</S> of<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S> by reason of<S>1537</S> the other<S>3062</S> voices<S>5456</S> of the trumpet<S>4536</S> of the three<S>5140</S> angels<S>32</S>, which<S>3588</S> are yet<S>3195</S> to sound<S>4537</S>!
